metadata.title: CVE-2018-16468 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In the Loofah gem for Ruby, through v2.2.2, unsanitized JavaScript mayoccur in sanitized output when a crafted SVG element is republished.

criterions.comment: ruby-loofah: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
